column1: #Text=Yin says : " This is the only letter we ever got from San .
#Text=" Yin says : " I 'm so sad that I never got to meet your mother , but you have her eyes .
#Text=I know from looking at you two that she must have been a wonderful bride for my boy .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sure they would want you to have this .
